channel.title: Comments on: Jesus, take the wheel – personally – from The Hils

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: oh yeah, forgot to mention this was on her "Dignity" tour...for real. it doesn't appear to be a wholesale remake of the DM tune - more like rihanna's appropriation of soft cell's "tainted love" for whatever new rubbish her handlers created for her recently.
item.content:encoded: oh yeah, forgot to mention this was on her “Dignity” tour…for real. it doesn’t appear to be a wholesale remake of the DM tune – more like rihanna’s appropriation of soft cell’s “tainted love” for whatever new rubbish her handlers created for her recently.

item.title: By: Tug
item.dc:creator: Tug
item.description: Did they change the lyrics around? I definitely never heard the words 'personal' or 'Jesus' in there. Maybe it's just the bad sound. My mom always said that you shouldn't take the 'Christ' out of Christmas, and I don't think you should take the Jesus out of Depeche Mode.
item.content:encoded: Did they change the lyrics around? I definitely never heard the words ‘personal’ or ‘Jesus’ in there. Maybe it’s just the bad sound. My mom always said that you shouldn’t take the ‘Christ’ out of Christmas, and I don’t think you should take the Jesus out of Depeche Mode.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: wow. That is a glorious and gorgeous train wreck. I can't avert mine eyes.
item.content:encoded: wow. That is a glorious and gorgeous train wreck. I can’t avert mine eyes.
